metadata.name: Night of the Living Vidiots
metadata.description: Sci-fi, horror, and comedy melted together and topped with a Twilight Zone twist. Darkly funny tales featuring mad science, gothic anime, TV zombies, kaiju, giant robots, monsters from the deep, and even a haunted sweatshirt. All the stories appear in Eye-Bleeding Full-Color. From the Emmy Award winning storyboard artist and character designer of Adventure Time. His previous books are the Babysitter and Escape from Dullsville.
